    • Method Detail

      • addShip

        public boolean addShip(Ship s)
        Adds ships to board. Checks that ship fits the board.
        Parameters:
        s - the ship that is checked
        Returns:
        boolean true if ship fits

      • getOptions

        public java.lang.Integer getOptions(BattleShipBoard b,
                                    int x,
                                    int y)
        Calculates number of valid shooting options at x,y coordinates on issued board. Used for cpu to choose best possible target.
        Parameters:
        b - the board which to check.
        x - the coordinate x
        y - the coordinate y
        Returns:
        number of possible options

      • isTaken

        public boolean isTaken(Ship s)
        Checks wheter another Ship already on board is interfering with this Ship
        Parameters:
        s - the Ship to be compared
        Returns:
        true if Ship cannot be inserted to current location on board.

      • fireShot

        public void fireShot(int x,
                     int y,
                     Player shooter)
        Fires a shot and checks wheter it hit or not.
        Parameters:
        x - the coordinate x
        y - the coordinate y
        shooter - the Player that fired the shot

      • isShot

        public boolean isShot(int x,
                      int y)
        Checks if current x,y location has been shot
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        boolean true if the location has been shot.

      • isShip

        public boolean isShip(int x,
                      int y)
        Checks if there is a Ship (that has been fired at) in speficied location If not, then removes them from the list.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        boolean true if there is a shot Ship in x,y location.

      • isNextToTwoShips

        public boolean isNextToTwoShips(int x,
                                int y)
        Checks if coordinate is between two different ships. Used for cpu to decide if it's reasonable to shoot here.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        boolean true if there is more than one ship next to x,y coordinates

      • nextIsShip

        public boolean nextIsShip(int x,
                          int y)
        Checks if there is a ship next to coordinates x,y Used for cpu to decide if it's reasonable to shoot here.
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        Returns:
        boolean true if there is a ship next to these x,y coordinates
